transArray.content: The express hotel was renovated a few years ago. The breakfast is good, with freshly ground coffee, a combination of Chinese and Western breakfast, and the linens are very good. It is not much different from a 4-5 star hotel. I am attending an event at the University of Economics and Business, but it is a bit far from the subway. , the Sichuan restaurant downstairs is very authentic!

We know each other as clear as water, as bright as a mirror, and our hearts are clear and reflected. I believe you must feel our sincerity and efforts. Your praise is our pride. We look forward to seeing you again.
